fields.label: Reason for end of service
fields.options:
Termination of contract, or agreement of the parties to terminate the contract
The contract is terminated by the employer
The termination of the contract by the employer for one of the cases mentioned in Article (80)
The worker left the work as a result of force majeure
Termination of employment for a contract of employment within six months of the marriage contract or within three months of the situation
A worker has left to work for one of the cases mentioned in Article (81)
The termination of the contract by the worker or leaving the worker to work other than the cases mentioned in Article (81)
The resignation of the worker

fields.description: For the working days of current month
fields.label: Pending Salary
